tender.title: South Gloucestershire Council: Housing Advice Service (AH009)
tender.description:
South Gloucestershire Councilis tendering for an external agency to deliver an independent housing advice service for the residents of South Gloucestershire to run for 3 years from 1 October 2014. 
South Gloucestershire is therefore inviting applications from suitably experienced Organisations to submit a Pre Qualifying questionnaire (PQQ) to be considered to tender for the service. 
It is the responsibility ofthe Organisation to forward copies of the reference request form to suitable referees and ensure they are returned to South Gloucestershire Council by end of business on 31 January 2014. 
The deadline for submittingquestions or requests for clarification in respect of thePQQ is also end of business on 31 January 2014. 
Suppliers mustsupply one printed copy of the completed PQQ together with an electronic copy in Microsoft Word or Adobe Acrobat format on CD-ROM. Deadline for return of the completed PQQ is 12 noon (BST) on 7 February 2014.
tender.submissionMethodDetails: Please apply directly to the buyer using the contact details provided.
